Detailed Description

This class manages the random behavior (Monte Carlo Simulation) of the library.

Author:
Angel A. Juan, Marcos Fernandez

Member Function Documentation

int [] srgcwscs.Randomness.calcPositionsArray (  ) 

Calculates a new savings edge order according to a randomization bias.It uses Lecuyer library for number generation.

Remarks:
It is strongly recommended to use calcPositionsArrayFast() instead of calcPositionsArray(). It is extremely more faster method
Returns:
int[] - new array of positions for selecting edges
Deprecated:
The performance of this method is really low in comparison to calcPositionsArrayFast() based on LinkedList which is extremely faster.
See also:
calcPositionsArrayFast()

Definition at line 177 of file Randomness.java.

Here is the call graph for this function:

int [] srgcwscs.Randomness.calcPositionsArray ( String  distribution,
int  noJob 
)

Calculates a new savings edge order according to a randomization bias.It uses Lecuyer library for number generation.

Parameters:
distribuntion - Type of geometric distribution for generating numbers T (Triangular) G (Geometric) U (Uniform)
noJob - number of jobs to run the randomization process
Returns:
int[] - new array of positions for selecting edges
See also:
calcPositionsArrayFast()

int [] srgcwscs.Randomness.calcPositionsArrayFast (  ) 

Calculates a new savings edge order according to a randomization bias.It uses Lecuyer library for number generation.

Remarks:
This method is faster than calcPositionsArray() it uses remove LinkedList method to speed up shifting process
Returns:
int[] - new array of positions for selecting edges

Definition at line 213 of file Randomness.java.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

int [] srgcwscs.Randomness.calcPositionsArrayFastJava (  ) 

Calculates a new savings edge order according to a randomization bias.

It uses Java Random library instead of Lecuyer library to generate new random values

Returns:
int[] - new array of positions for selecting edges
See also:
calcPositionsArrayFast()

String  dist 
) [private]

Gets a random position according to a given type of distribution.

Parameters:
n - int edge index to find a new position
dist - Distribution (t or T for Triangular, g or G for Geometric otherwise uniform
Returns:
random between 0 and n -1

) [private]

Gets a random position according to a given type of distribution.

Remarks:
Get a new random values based on a geometric distribution using Java Library
Parameters:
n - int edge index to find a new position
dist - Distribution (t or T for Triangular, g or G for Geometric otherwise uniform)
Returns:
random between 0 and n -1
